entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
